website_summaries.verdict: With angled brushes and a tall frame, this boot scrubber gives you extra leverage to dig out the dirt.
pros: Angled brushes help remove bacteria, refuse, dirt, and other contaminants
Steel scraper below the brushes assists in the removal of heavy debris
Non-absorbent plastic block with durable polypropylene bristles
Chrome-plated steel, tube frame can be secured to the floor with bolts (sold separately)
cons: Metal frame is a bit thin

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: Superior design to the more traditional boot scrapers/brushes that I have had. The traditional brushes get clogged with mud (I live in So. Oregon with the clay soil that is typical of this area) and don't remove the mud as easily as the Carlisle. With the Carlisle, it is much easier to remove mud from the sides and back of the heel of my boots. Plus the bar underneath the brushes is great for getting the mud off that gets stuck against the heel.
customer_reviews.author: BillyJoeBob

customer_reviews.title: i like the idea of the metal scraper when you flip ...
customer_reviews.text: it's not as sturday as i expected ... and it's not level when you set it down ... also, the mounting hardware was missing. the brushes don't stay in one place because there are no notches or grooves to hold them in different positions. i like the idea of the metal scraper when you flip back the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Only an issue if you are super short
customer_reviews.text: As for the intent - fabulous. Totally does the job. My issue is that at 5'2" I get some - um - blowback. If it were just a little mud that might be so bad but I use this to scrape off my muck boots after working in the chicken coop so it's a lot more than mud. My husband at 5'8" does not get hit in the face so it really just a short person problem. I'm trying to come up with a splash guard of sorts to help. Otherwise it does what it should and is heavy enough that we just have it in the grass, not screwed down and it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: JenLivingLife

customer_reviews.title: I'm a tennis player and my tennis shoes are plagued ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tennis player and my tennis shoes are plagued by the clay that gets stuck in them everyday. I have this out my side door on top of an outdoor rug. I didnt need to nail or screw it to anything. I have a size 8 foot and it works well to remove the clay so i can walk inside and take off my shoes without tracking clay everywhere. I'm had it for a month or so now and no rust or weathering issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina O.

customer_reviews.title: Broke...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who always has caked mud on his boots - worked great until it broke after about a year. the brush broke free from the metal frame...too bad because the brushes were nice and sturdy. If you look close to the picture, you can see the hole for the metal frame on the base of the brush is very close to the edge - leaving not much room for 'wear and tear'. this is where it broke.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: This is THE ABSOLUTE BEST boot scraper/brush ever made, EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Why have I waited so long to buy this highly effective product??? I've bought and tried half a dozen styles and brands over the years of living on a farm and the Carlisle is without a doubt, #1! It's simple and robust design are amazingly effective and the quality of the product is great, plus replacing the brushes is so easy. The house is so much cleaner now because my boots aren't tracking in anything! Definitely glad we found this and we already bought several more for the barn, RV and back deck!
customer_reviews.author: Damon D. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: Best boot and shoe scraper I've ever found. Well worth the money. I've tried about everything out there and this is the one. We live on a ranch--mud, grass, dirt, manure--all is removed! We wear very deep tread boots and this managed it remove 95% or better. Reduced my sweeping time by 3/4. You can mount it or not--portable if you want. We have a guesthouse and I just move it when we have family in. Best money I've spent in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans debris off boots
customer_reviews.text: This shoe and boot scraper is good at removing the mud and debris that can accumulate on the bottoms of heavy lugged sole work boots. It could be a touch sturdier as in the wire frame could be a bit thicker but overall for the price it is worth it. The bristles are very stiff and will hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: Best boot/shoe cleaner ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best boot cleaner that I have ever used. I have to work in trenches some times running underground utilities and the mud likes to stick. This boot cleaner is light weight but very sturdy. It cleans the tread and arch of your boot or shoe quickly and easily. I keep it in the bed of my truck to use whenever I need. I recommend this to everyone that I can. It is weather resistance and cleans up easy. The brushes last along time and replacements can be purchased for around $15.00 each. 5* all the way
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This is the best! Good stiff brushes that cleans your shoes and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! Good stiff brushes that cleans your shoes and boots really well . It sure has helped keep the dirt out of my house. I did not bolt it down., we hold it with one foot while brushing the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: The boot brush arrived on time and in good condition. It appears to be sturdy enough and will hopefully stand up to the heat and rain. Now if you could only get my husband to remember to use it every time he comes in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C.

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact it screws down to the deck. I mounted it parallel to the front wall so I could lean on the wall as I kick my boots across the brushed. Worked excellent and the quality was obvious. A bit more money than other models but well worth the cost difference.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this indispensable boot/shoe scraper getting mud, snow and debris off our footwear for four years and looking back only wish we'd found it years earlier. We mounted it on two 2/4's about 2 1/2 feet long to aid in stability, That's it. It's been outside in the elements all these years and still looks like new!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job of getting boots clean.
customer_reviews.text: Could have a stronger frame but it will get the job done. Time will tell how long the brushes will last but fresh out of the box they do a good job of getting my boots clean on the bottoms and sides which makes my wife happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. W.

customer_reviews.title: Really Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised how nice this is. Works great and I love that the brushes flip out to do the shoe bottoms. The only suggestion I have is to mount it to a board to give it more stability. Great Product
customer_reviews.author: bdog2009

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter  rainy season
customer_reviews.text: Wondered if we would have to secure this on a stand but does well outside the door on its own. Has saved a lot of dirt and mud from coming in house this winter.
customer_reviews.author: MJ.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I walk up on the deck, use my shoe boot/cleaner, then go in the house. Easy to use and cuts down on dirt. Now, if I could only teach my dog how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Best Price I found in 2015
customer_reviews.text: Great utilitarian boot scraper. Lasts for many years. I repurchases only because the sun trashed the bristles on the first one we've had for many years. While I believe the bristle attachments are made to be replaced, the manufacturer/distributor has priced them too high and it's less expensive to buy a whole new unit. Go figure that.
customer_reviews.author: KC Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy enough on its own. Moreso if it is mounted. It works. Cleans my boots of the droppings I walk through while doing the livestock-related chores.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Severns

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to install. Been installed for weeks and haven't washed and it still keeps the shoes clean! Perfect if you're stuck parking in a dirty spot and don't wanna track the dirt inside!
customer_reviews.author: NY Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the boot scrubber, I have gotten cheaper ones in the past and they dont last, ive had this one for 2 years and it still looks brand new, highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for anyone who works in construction!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this comes already put together!! Each side flips up to get to the scraper. It’s sturdily made. My husband uses one at work and now can use one at home as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Spunkygirl83

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Has 4 screw holes. I use it for my cat's. They groom themselves on it. Bristles are firm.
customer_reviews.author: Accutek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot brush
customer_reviews.text: Works great for all sides of your boot or shoe
customer_reviews.author: WB68

customer_reviews.title: Best overall mud remover
customer_reviews.text: We live on a farm and have used many different boot scrubbers, but this one is hands down the best! But you have to bolt it down to something solid
customer_reviews.author: Paul Longfellow

customer_reviews.title: Clean boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great to remove construction site mud from workers boots. Metal scraper, and sturdy brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Inigo Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe brush - keeps most of dirt and mud ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe brush - keeps most of dirt and mud from being tracked into building and onto carpet. Personnel are using them as long and brushes are in good working order
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Clean shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy loved the tilting bristle brushes.... Can get in all the nooks and crannies!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Built to last.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Other boot brushes I’ve purchased fell apart in just a few days. This one has been working well for quite some time. Built solid to handle heavy mud and thick sand buildup. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I mounted it on my deck next to my heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: I mounted it on my deck next to my heavy brush scraper - this works well with lighter debris and helps clean out the grooves on my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ferron Oaks

customer_reviews.title: ... this replacement brush for the last few months - great upgrade to existing shoe cleaners where the brushes are ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this replacement brush for the last few months - great upgrade to existing shoe cleaners where the brushes are worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cost effective replacement
customer_reviews.text: Our existing boot brush was quite worn after over five years of use. Replacing just the brushes was a much less expensive and easier option than replacing the entire assembly.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: clean the bottom of your shoes good.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement brushes easy to change out. These really clean the bottom of your shoes good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable brush
customer_reviews.text: It's a really handy, and it gets rid of the dirt on my shoes, and it's good quality, but the bad thing is it doesn't fit in the house, because it leaves the sang and stuff in the house, which is a lot of trouble for me, but it's a lot better than the one I had before.
customer_reviews.author: CARLEEN WALSH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for knocking the dirt and mud off after working on the farm and in the barn.
customer_reviews.author: class2canoe

customer_reviews.title: Gets the mud off of work boots very well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my office and tool trailer. It really helps keep the areas clean
customer_reviews.author: melissa duvall

customer_reviews.title: Best boot brush in the world
customer_reviews.text: This is the best boot brush in the world. I think it's kind of expensive for what it is but man does it work!
customer_reviews.author: JTW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Grateful for it so I can keep the dirt down.
customer_reviews.author: Will S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our trailer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our trailer. We keep this outside the door of our travel trailer while camped out in the woods and it keeps the inside much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best boot scraper!
customer_reviews.text: Repeat purchase - best boot scraper and wanted one for the basement entrance.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well made equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very good product- does exactly what we needed- husband has very wide feet and needed a durable shoe cleaner that would remove dirt and mud after using tractor in field
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a Godsend this winter.... We love the way the brushed can flip up for better access to scrape bar or bottom of boots.
customer_reviews.author: lpe

customer_reviews.title: Great for muddy footwear!
customer_reviews.text: We've had one of these for 30 years and needed to at last replace it. It does a great job in cleaning boots and shoes, and we're awfully glad these are still manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: KRR

customer_reviews.title: Best boot brush I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Very short but sweet. New England weather, rural location, It works!
customer_reviews.author: N Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money for something that wont break anytime soon. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good for drier muddy boots
customer_reviews.text: Good for drier muddy boots. Gets compacted very quickly and needs cleaning. Also, needs to be mounted on a heavy board due to shifting when using.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Frame is too thin where the holes for bolting brush to floor are. Broke in around a year.
customer_reviews.author: jose lopez jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item a month ago and right away start using it .It seem like a study nice quality shoe scraper, it arrived promptly so for all this reasons I am very satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot brush for the farm, home or office.
customer_reviews.text: Gotta have these when working around animals in the mud. Keeps my office clean when our staff actually uses them. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boot Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the absolute best boot scrubber on the market. Great price compared to other sites
customer_reviews.author: JWake

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great boot cleaner, better than any of the small models. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: fespo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I have it sitting on dirt and it doesn't move around.
customer_reviews.author: elimelech kleinman

customer_reviews.title: Posting mistake
customer_reviews.text: I did not mean to send a negative review. I have not used it yet, I think it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Mark Munden

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Rugged design not like the cheap ones you see for sale all the time. Worth every penny. I have bought them for gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: KM-1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my brother. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: V. Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Best boot brush
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for this brush to replace the one we had had for many years. None of the farm stores carry it. This is by far better than the one they carry. Hope it lasts as long as our first one did.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Grant

customer_reviews.title: no more tracking dirt in the house
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product at a retreat in west verginia where we were staying and loved it. Came home searched amazon and found it. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: jim petty

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Attach them to a two foot square of 3/4" plywood.
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: Item didn't come with anything to nail it to. ...
customer_reviews.text: Item didn't come with anything to nail it to. But we found a piece of wood. This helps keep it in place when cleaning shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shopbills

customer_reviews.title: Carlisle 4042414 Spectrum Commercial Boot 'N
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in cleaning any dirt (mud or sand) off both bottom and sides of shoes. Works really well on golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D M R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We needed a replacement, and this is very well made. Appreciate the quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Clean Shoes, Yay!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son-in-law, an item he requested. I searched out a variety of boot scrapers before settling on this choice. According to him it works great, and according to my daughter there is considerably less mess from shoes in her house! They live where mud is a frequent issue. It looks to be well made and we expect a long life of use from it.
customer_reviews.author: CKA

product_meta.title: Carlisle 4042414 Commercial Boot 'N Shoe Brush Scraper with Chrome Plated Steel Frame, Blue
product_meta.description:
Size:Complete Unit| Style:1 Pack| Color:Blue

The Carlisle 4042414 Spectrum Boot 'N Shoe brush contains two brushes with blue polypropylene bristles attached to a chrome-plated steel frame and can be used to brush shoes free of dirt and debris before entering a workplace. The polypropylene bristles resist stains, odors, bacteria, fungi, and wear, and are suitable for wet or dry conditions. The brushes flip up to expose a steel scraper that can be used to remove heavy debris. Each brush is attached to a plastic block that resists moisture. The chrome-plated steel frame resists wear, corrosion, and impacts, and can be wiped clean. Holes at the bottom of the frame can be used to mount the Boot 'N Shoe brush to the floor. This product measures 14-3/4 x 7 inches (L x H). (L is length, the horizontal distance from front to back; H is height, the vertical distance from lowest to highest point.) The steel scraper is 16-1/2" long. The bristles are 2-1/2" long. This product is free of BPA (Bisphenol A) to address food safety concerns raised by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and other organizations.

Carlisle manufactures food service equipment and supplies and sanitary maintenance tools and supplies for commercial, industrial, and institutional facilities. The company, founded in 1954, is headquartered in Oklahoma City, OK.
feature_bullets: Angled brushes help remove bacteria, refuse, dirt, and other contaminants from boots and shoes before entering sensitive sites, such as food processing areas
Steel scraper below the brushes assists in the removal of heavy debris
Non-absorbent Plastic block with durable polypropylene bristles for extended life
Chrome-plated steel tube frame can be secured to the floor with bolts (sold separately)
Made with FDA compliant block and bristles

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
